content.new:
It appears that auth0 is asked to give a callback at the current url, instead of the standard url of cloudsim.io

To reproduce: 

Go to https://cloudsim.io/dashboard or any not bare domain name and try to login.

issue.title: If you are on a subpage when you try to login you get an error about an invalid callback url
